data.oai_dc:dc:
Field long-term monitoring survey of ecologically intact zone (control) within the human-impacted area at north-western part of the Black Sea.

25 samples (hand box-corer 10×10 cm) were taken on silty-sandy littoral (0.3 m depth) and mud flat of the Grygorivsky Liman, the NW Black Sea (46°37’ N, 31°01’ E). Salinity 14 - 18 ppm.

|143 occurrences
